title: WTB - N172 or N173 Jocko Flynn / Standing Pose
author: Rayv1

posts.post_title: WTB - N172 or N173 Jocko Flynn / Standing Pose
posts.post_content: WTB - a N172 or  N173 Jocko Flynn in the Standing Pose.  I think the # for the N172 is164.5-1
Good luck, there is only one known in private hands. My guess is that such a card would command a high five to six figure number at auction.
Ok. Thanks.  I have the glass negative from the 'Vermont find' for that particular pose.  So, looking for the card..I will keep looking...
